ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup popcorn kernels, popped in an air popper

cookingTips: Toss popcorn while still warm to help seasonings adhere
Use a light hand with za'atar as it's potent and flavorful
Spread on a baking sheet to cool for best texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on the savory nature of this snack and explain what nutritional yeast provides (cheesy umami flavor). Suggest this as a healthy alternative to traditional buttered popcorn.
